name: Jewel Maker
blurb: A place value addition game about jewels.

name: Find the Groundhog!
blurb: An early childhood sight words game. Answer the questions correctly and feed the hungry groundhog!

name: Pizza Pie Fractions
blurb: A math game about slicing pizzas as the denominator, topping them as the numerator, and feeding your hungry guests!

name: Caleb's Math Mystery!
blurb: Built in Phaser 3, solve the mystery of the muddy footprints by exploring Caleb's house and answering math questions!

name: Comparison Maze
blurb: A Pac-Man like game, where your direction in the maze changes the inequality sign. Navigate the maze and score correct inequalities!

name: Ice Cream Change
blurb: Get a random flavor of ice cream, and count the correct change to pay for it!

name: Train Builder
blurb: Build trains with mixed number values, by using cars with specific fractions!

name: Alphabet Bubble Pop
blurb: In this early childhood letter sight game, pop bubbles with the correct letter!

name: Ice Cream Patterns
blurb: In this early childhood patterns game, build an ice cream cone with the right pattern!

name: Go, Ducks, Go!
blurb: In this early childhood grammar game, follow a group of ducklings through their adventure in Brooklyn!

name: Blackfooted Cat
blurb: In this early childhood punctuation game, find the mysterious blackfooted cat, and help them reconnect with their family!
